name: Genaro
description:
Genaro is a prototype game about life.

Build the genome of a plant and follow its story.

All sort of things will happen in the tiny life of that tiny plant who will inevitably die at some point...


Planned Upgrades:

  • more balanced and comprehensible behaviour of the plant and resources.
  • better text generation.
  • blooming, reproduction and fruits.
  • save system.


This project is made for the GBJAM5.

(Here is the palette I used)
